Settings About Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Border top Border bottom urlstring> This is a CardView widget. CardView widgets can have shadows and rounded corners. 

To create a card with a shadow, use the android:elevation attribute. 

To set the corner radius in your layouts, use the card_view:cardCornerRadius attribute.
